intro: Psychotria korupensis, commonly known as the Korup psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of Cameroon and is typically found in humid, shaded understory environments. The plant features elliptical to ovate leaves with a glossy surface and produces small, clustered flowers in white or pale yellow. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Psychotria korupensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique ecological role and potential medicinal properties.
